Youth club rape probe: An arrest, and 5 more victims

Allegations of sexual abuse at the Arlington Boys & Girls Club from the 1970s to 1990s continue to escalate as police said they have identified five more victims and arrested a former employee of the club Friday in New York. (1:52 p.m.)

Mass. travelers delayed after Conn. train crash

The collision of two commuter trains in Connecticut Friday left rail traffic in the Northeast Corridor at an indefinite standstill today, causing delays and headaches. (1:03 p.m.)

Thesis: Let in only
high-IQ immigrants

A former Harvard doctoral student's thesis concluded that Latino immigrants have lower IQs and argued the US should only allow immigrants with high IQs, sparking outrage at the Ivy League school.
